job_title: Volunteer in Portsmouth, Isle of Wight, South East England, England
pros: Great people, great service and great charity
cons: No cons, great people doing great work

pros: no positives about working for this charity
cons: mislead around job role and responsibilities and then refused to pay final salary

review_title: Interesting work but management cld. have been better.  Health & safety 'wanting'!
pros: Very rewarding work with clients; plenty of staff training available; support (in general) from management when required; also able to work on own initiative, taking calls from clients; arranging my own diary; follow-ups etc.
cons: Unfair disciplinary procedures for sickness that I could not have avoided; felt I could no longer work effectively for them; very sad about letting clients down.     Inadequate health & safety practices/equipment for employees - improved much later on.

pros: Cannot think of any good reasons to work for them, I would say job security but that would be a lie.
cons: No respect from the big bosses,  the manger above me had no experience of management and felt threatened by the fact I did. He got the job based on the fact he knew the guy in charge, he was unable to do the job and made my job as hard as possible and any mistakes he made he passed them off as mine which was unfair. Any good ideas that I had, and were accepted by the big bosses he passed off as his own.

pros: good experience working as charity shop manager though for a very short span of 1 year. It provides an opportunity for serving community as well as make a career.

review_title: Nice, friendly local charity. Very welcoming.
job_title: Head of Retail in Winchester, England
pros: Friendly, vibrant, forward thinking,  lovely staff
cons: The only cons is also a pro, it is a small charity
